name: NekoMiko
description: The main character is an unfortunate man who can't do anything well. One fateful day, he meets 2 cat-eared shrine maidens by the name of Ayame and Kaede at an old shrine, and ends up living with them! Set in Akihabara, enjoy this adventure game of the slightly dirty-minded and eventful cohabitation life with 2 cat-eared shrine maidens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported) Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 620 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound Additional Notes: Support Pixel Phaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 (Windows RT and 10 Mobile are not supported) Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1030 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound Additional Notes: 1920x1080px or higher / Support Pixel Phaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required
